title: McCullum says England 'trained too much' as Stokes questions mentality
subtitle: Coach Brendon McCullum says England trained "too much" while captain Ben Stokes raised questions about his side's mentality after their defeat in the second Ashes Test.
full_text: Coach Brendon McCullum says England trained "too much" while captain Ben Stokes raised questions about his side's mentality after their defeat in the second Ashes Test.
